annotation.spannedText: Vaccinating dogs is the most cost-effective strategy for preventing rabies in people

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinating dogs is the most cost-effective strategy for preventing rabies in people

annotation.spannedText: The same safe and effective vaccines can be used for pre-exposure immunization

classMention.mentionClass: The same safe and effective vaccines can be used for pre-exposure immunization

annotation.spannedText: In developing countries, the vaccination status of the suspected animal alone should not be considered when deciding whether to initiate prophylaxis or not

classMention.mentionClass: In developing countries, the vaccination status of the suspected animal alone should not be considered when deciding whether to initiate prophylaxis or not

annotation.spannedText: Stockpiles of dog and human rabies vaccine have had a catalytic effect on rabies elimination efforts

classMention.mentionClass: Stockpiles of dog and human rabies vaccine have had a catalytic effect on rabies elimination efforts

annotation.spannedText: All category II and III exposures assessed as carrying a risk of developing rabies require PEP

classMention.mentionClass: All category II and III exposures assessed as carrying a risk of developing rabies require PEP

annotation.spannedText: the human and animal health sectors have come together to adopt a common strategy against this devastating but massively neglected disease

classMention.mentionClass: the human and animal health sectors have come together to adopt a common strategy against this devastating but massively neglected disease

annotation.spannedText: The use of stimulus packages consisting of technical and material support to kick-start rabies prevention programs for endemic countries and regions has proven successful

classMention.mentionClass: The use of stimulus packages consisting of technical and material support to kick-start rabies prevention programs for endemic countries and regions has proven successful
